name: diamond_deposits
title: Diamond Deposits
description: The diamonds dataset contains a list of all known diamond deposits throughout the world. Dataset downloaded August 2017

extract_types_info.count: total count of pixels per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.mean: average diamond deposits cover for each unit of analysis

extras.citation: Gilmore, Elisabeth; Nils Petter Gleditsch, Päivi Lujala & Jan Ketil Rød, 2005. ‘Conflict Diamonds: A New Dataset’, Conflict Management and Peace Science 22(3): 257–292
